data.text: @Politics1com @BrownJessemb27 If you look at the table there appear to be buttons on the left side which, no doubt, will open up when pressed to send whoever disagrees with Putin into a water tank filled with ravenous sea bass (as sharks were too expensive). https://t.co/MwWo6bldcL
@Politics1com You could bowl on that desk. https://t.co/oMS2vnBxbP
@Politics1com Or you may perhaps be attempting to hide some other medical condition?
@Politics1com Perhaps he’s got a serious Illness and is immunocompromised. He looks more bloated in recent photos.
@Politics1com Look at this Libtard scared of COVID…

@Politics1com Covid isn't the only thing he is sitting out of range of; very few people can effectively hit a target with a pistol from that range with the first shot. 
Putin's been in power for twenty years by killing people, a lot of them; such men tend to be paranoid, and with good reason.
@Politics1com It's the length of a bowling alley ! Very appropriate given their economy is falling like nine-pins
